programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Living Planet

programme.title: Interface

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: First Light

programme.title: The Astronauts

programme.title: Next Stop Mars

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK

programme.title: Atmosphere
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Atmosphere, S03E02, How do astronauts cope with living in space?

programme.title: From There To Here
programme.desc: The New Frontier: From There To Here, S01E01, Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive, 20160101080000 +0000, The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Swamp Diamonds
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Swamp Diamonds, S05E03, An undercover police woman infiltrates a group of hardened female criminals who plan to break out of prison and retrieve diamonds from a swamp.

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Human Duplicators, S05E20, An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Secret Agent Super Dragon, S05E04, A secret agent tries to stop a drug lord from taking over the world with hallucinogenic chewing gum.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

MST3K: Tormented, 19920926000000 +0000, In Tormented, jazz pianist Tom Stewart, soon to marry the woman he loves, watches former love Vi Mason fall from a lighthouse and does not save her. Vi’s spirit returns and begins to torment Tom at his every step.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E13, A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.
MST3K: Zombie Nightmare, 19941124000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E11, A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.
MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler, 19931107000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).
MST3K: Teenage Caveman, 19911109000000 +0000, In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

MST3K: Teenagers From Outer Space, 19920626000000 +0000, A group of aliens land on Earth and decide to use the planet as a farm for their livestock. One of the aliens rebels and flees to a small town, where he is pursued by another alien who kills anyone in his path.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

Second Honeymoon, 20010311000000 +0000, Revolves around a couple on the verge of announcing plans to divorce who reluctantly depart for a second honeymoon after their family surprises them with a tropical vacation as a gift for their 20th wedding anniversary.

Signed, Sealed, Delivered, 20131012000000 +0000, A mix up on her first day of work sends Shane to the Dead Letter Office, where a group of quirky characters led by Oliver try to deliver the undeliverable. Stars Eric Mabius and Kristin Booth. SSD Movie #1.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.
When Calls the Heart, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Maggie Grace stars as Elizabeth Thatcher, a cultured young teacher in 1910.

programme.title: The Dream
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E06, Hallmark Original Series. Joy dreams that Abigail and Donovan break up.

programme.title: The Tableau
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie displays Nathaniel Merriwick's paintings for Grey House's 225th birthday.

programme.title: The Chocolates
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E08, Hallmark Original Series. Kenny the Chocolate King comes to Middleton.

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Good Witch, S06E09, Hallmark Original Series. When Cassie's book club can't see eye to eye, she invites her friends on a trip.

programme.title: Trinity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E06, The team discover the remains of an experiment the Ancients were working on to create the ultimate power generator and McKay believes he can finish what the Ancients started. Teyla and Ronon discover Ronon is not the last of his kind.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E07, Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E09, Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Justice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E10, Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E21, SG-1 encounters a tricky situation when they join forces with androids designed to look like them in a battle against an evil Goa'uld System Lord. Can they fight alongside robotic doppelgangers, or will confusion and contradiction blur the line?

programme.title: Exodus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E22, SG-1 joins forces with the Tok'ra in a final attempt to rid the universe of their mutual Goa'uld nemesis, Apophis. But their plan goes awry when a member of the team is captured and they find themselves at the mercy of their most feared enemy!

programme.title: Enemies
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E01, Presumed dead, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) is discovered very much alive…but still under the control of the evil Apophis (Peter Williams). Will the SG-1 team be able to rescue their friend from the clutches of Apophis or will they die trying?

programme.title: Threshold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E02, While Teal’c’s body has been saved from death on Apophis’ ship, his mind is still loyal to his Goa’uld lord. Jaffa Master Bra’tac suggests an ancient ritual to restore Teal'c's mind...a ritual fraught with danger and one which no one has survived.

programme.title: Ascension
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E03, While investigating an alien device Carter is found unconscious. Resting from suspected exhaustion, she is visited by an invisible being who holds vital secrets to the device and more. But how does she convince SG-1 that she is not delusional?

programme.title: The Fifth Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E04, When the SG-1 team reports in from a brutal mission, they discover that their fifth team member -- Lt. Tyler -- may not actually have been real. Does this mean the end of the Stargate Program? If the Pentagon's Col. Simmons has his way, it will.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E031, Jim and Cindy leave for Hong Kong. Kelly wants to continue her relationship with Brandon, but he cannot get over the rejected marriage proposal.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.

programme.title: The Return of Jessie
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E18, Kekoa is devastated when Jessie tells JD that he’s the father of her child. A rescued bodyboarder is paralyzed. Sean has a romantic encounter with a beautiful, woman he thinks might really be Pele, the goddess fire.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E19, Investigating toxic dumping, Sean and Leigh end up chained inside a chamber slowly filling with toxic seawater. Can Sam get them out in time? To raise money, Jason and Zack have to hula dance in grass skirts in front of a lot of women.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E20, Leigh takes over at Baywatch while Sean, Jason, and Zack go to compete in a 12-mile race of natural obstacles. Jessie’s presence at the race creates turmoil. Leigh and Jenna pretend to be lesbian lovers.

programme.title: Makapu'u Lighthouse
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E21, For a rescue, Sean is awarded a free week at Hilton Hawaiian Village, which he declines. Zack pretends he’s Sean and enjoys all the freebies until Sean shows up! A pretty fashion photographer thinks Jason has top model potential.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E22, Sean has a decision – move to Australia or stay in Hawaii. Zack sees Leigh naked, leading to complications with her fiancé Sam. Kekoa dumps JD and becomes a party girl. When Sam leaves Leigh at the altar, Sean asks Leigh to marry him instead.

programme.title: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E01, Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: In Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E02, Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Heat Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E03, During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E04, Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E05, Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: The Sky is Falling
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E06, After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E07, A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.

programme.title: Rookie School
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E08, While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Cruise Ship
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E09, Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.
